title: Kelly Wearstler shares tips from her interior design MasterClass
itunes:title: Kelly Wearstler shares tips from her interior design MasterClass
description: Kelly Wearstler has held reign in interior design since arriving in Los Angeles in the 1990s. She’s now teaching an online MasterClass. Her tips for improving one's space might be timely for people sheltering in place.
itunes:summary: Kelly Wearstler has held reign in interior design since arriving in Los Angeles in the 1990s. She’s now teaching an online MasterClass. Her tips for improving one's space might be timely for people sheltering in place.
